marklogic.body:
You just reminded me of my 21st!Â I was supposed to meet my boyfriend at his place after class to go out and celebrate; when I arrived I found no boyfriend, but that his dog had had explosive Diarrhea while in her crate.Â I cleaned dog Diarrhea her, the wall, every bar of the crate for hours, still waiting for him (this was pre-cell phone days).Â He never came home.Â So I spent the rest of the night sitting at his house waiting for him to show up.
I found out the next day he was in jail.Â I've Always been good at picking the boys.
